name: washing machine
description:
Client is a 42-year-old mother of two children aged 18 (M) and 12 (F). She is currently unemployed and unfit for work due to medical reasons. She is recently married to an Indonesian who is unemployed and currently working for employment. Client is currently receiving Comcare financial assistance for rental fees, utilities, medical bills, and basic needs. Unfortunately, the family’s washing machine has recently malfunctioned. The family has been washing their clothes manually.

The donation of a washing machine will greatly help the family to focus on spending their energy on looking for work and studying for school.

name: Commode with wheels
description:
Commode
61-year-old patient has late stage cancer and hypertension. He requires a commode with wheels at home but he and his wife are unable to afford one. He is medically unfit for work while his wife is his caregiver. Wife hope for a new/unused one as patient are mindful about hygiene. Appreciate if donor can contact me at Whatsapp at 9727 4215. Thank you!

passiton.name: Commode chair with wheels
passiton.description: Very lightly used for shower time only. No rust. Seat pad over the pot allows it to be used as indoor wheelchair.
